name: Account Compromised Playbook
description:
# **Account Compromised Playbook**             ![TAG](https://img.shields.io/badge/HIGH-Potential%20Account Compromised%20Detected-orange) [![Account Compromised Playbook][accountcompromisedplaybook-shield]][accountcompromisedplaybook-url] [![Investigate][investigate-shield]][investigate-url] 

[![Help Desk][helpdesk-shield]][helpdesk-url] 

### **1. Account Compromised - Detect**
[![Account Compromised Detect](https://github.com/socfortress/Playbooks/raw/main/IRP-AccountCompromised/Workflows/AccountCompromised-Workflow-Detect.png "Account Compromised Detect")](https://github.com/socfortress/Playbooks/tree/main/IRP-AccountCompromised#2-detect)


### **2. Account Compromised - Analyze**
[![Account Compromised Analyze](https://github.com/socfortress/Playbooks/raw/main/IRP-AccountCompromised/Workflows/AccountCompromised-Workflow-Analyze.png "Account Compromised Analyze")](https://github.com/socfortress/Playbooks/tree/main/IRP-AccountCompromised#3-analyze)


### **3. Account Compromised - Contain/Eradicate**
[![Account Compromised Contain/Eradicate](https://github.com/socfortress/Playbooks/raw/main/IRP-AccountCompromised/Workflows/AccountCompromised-Workflow-Contain_Eradicate.png "Account Compromised Contain/Eradicate")](https://github.com/socfortress/Playbooks/tree/main/IRP-AccountCompromised#4-contain--eradicate)


### **4. Account Compromised - Recover**
[![Account Compromised Recover](https://github.com/socfortress/Playbooks/raw/main/IRP-AccountCompromised/Workflows/AccountCompromised-Workflow-Recover.png "Account Compromised Recover")](https://github.com/socfortress/Playbooks/tree/main/IRP-AccountCompromised#5-recover)


### **5. Account Compromised - Post Incident**
[![Account Compromised Post Incident](https://github.com/socfortress/Playbooks/raw/main/IRP-AccountCompromised/Workflows/AccountCompromised-Workflow-Post_Incident.png "Account Compromised Post Incident")](https://github.com/socfortress/Playbooks/tree/main/IRP-AccountCompromised#6-post-incident)

[investigate-url]: https://investigate.socfortress.co/app/index.html?#/search/all

tasks.title: AR1. Update Defenses
tasks.description:
Determine which of the following rules needs to be removed and which needs to stay in the following list:  
- Firewall Rules
- EDR 
    - ban hashes
    - ban domains
    - Containment
- Proxy Block

tasks.title: AP1. Incident Review
tasks.description:
- What worked
- What didn't work

tasks.title: AP2. Update Mode of Operations
tasks.description:
Update the following documents as requiered:  
- Policies
- Processes
- Procedures
- Playbooks
- Runbooks

Update Detetion Rules in:  
- SIEM
- Anti-Spam
- Malware Gataway
- EDR
- Other security solution

tasks.title: AP3. Review Defensive Posture
tasks.description:
- Schedule review of newly introduced rules in6 months
- Are the following still applicatble
    - Firewall Rules
    - Proxy Rules for C2
    - AV / EDR custom Signatures
    - IPS Signatures

tasks.title: AA4. Update Scope
tasks.description:
- Update lists of
    - affected endpoints
    - affected Company Entities
    - affected clients

tasks.title: AA5. Scope Validation
tasks.description:
Have all the machines been identified? 
If you find futher traces of phishing or new IOCs go back through this step.  

When you are done identifying all compromised:  
- Hosts

And investigated all:  
- URLs
- Domains
- IP
- Ports
- Files
- Hash

tasks.title: AC1. Block
tasks.description:
- Update FW, Proxy, etc. rules
- Blackhole DNS
- Submit to Partners
    - AV/EDR Vendor
    - Web Filter Vendor
    - etc.

tasks.title: AC4. Close Monitoring
tasks.description:
- Monitor for 
    - Related incoming messages
    - Internet connections to IOC
    - New files that matches hashes identified

tasks.title: AC6. New IOC Discovered?
tasks.description: If there was new IOC discovered, go back to the [Analyze Phase](https://github.com/socfortress/Playbooks/tree/main/IRP-AccountCompromised#3-analyze)

tasks.title: AD4. Triage
tasks.description:
Determine
- Impact
    - Of 
    - Financial
    - Data loss
- Scope (Nb of people)

tasks.title: AC3. Malware Infection?
tasks.description:
If there was malicious attachments that were openned we need to assume the endpoint(s) was/were infected by a malware.  
Please continue to the [Malware Playbook](https://github.com/socfortress/Playbooks/tree/main/IRP-Malware)

tasks.title: AA2. List Compromised Credentials
tasks.description:
In the Compromised Assets TAB of the Event Log list:   
- Compromised accounts
- Compromised machines
- Compromised domains

tasks.title: AR2. All Affected Endpoints Recovered?
tasks.description: If all affected endpoints have been contained, you can go to the next phase, otherwise continue bellow.

tasks.title: AC2. Validate User's Actions
tasks.description:
What did the user last access?

  - Servers
  - File Shares
  - Sharepoint
  - etc

tasks.title: AD3. Data Colletion
tasks.description:
Domains  
- Reputation
- Registrar
- Owner
- IP
- Multistage / Redirect
- Technologies of the site
    - WordPress
    - Joomla
    - Custom Page (credential phish)

IP  
- Reputation
- Owner
- Geo Localisation
- Other domains on that IP

tasks.title: AD1. Identify Threat Indicators
tasks.description:
#### Alerts
Alerts are be generated by differents systems owned by the Security/SOC team. The main sources for alerts are  
- Tickets
- SIEM
- Anti-Virus / EDR
- Reports
    - DNS
    - Web Proxy
- Errors from mail servers

#### Notifications
Notifications are comming from external sources usually via email, Teams or phone. The main sources for notifications are  
- Users (internal)
- Recipents of emails (external)
- Third Parties
- ISP
- Mail Providers

tasks.title: AD2. Identify Risks Factors
tasks.description:
#### Common
- Credential Theft
- Malware Delivery
- Criminal Activites
    - Blackmail / Ransom

#### Company Specific
- Financial Losses
    - Lost of conctrat
    - Contract not renewed
    - Lower bid to our clients
    - Fines
        - Regulation

tasks.title: AA1. Verify
tasks.description:
In conjunction with a senior member of the SOC  
- Double check previous data
- Rule out False Positive

tasks.title: AA3. Level of Access / Priviledges
tasks.description:
In conjonction with a senior member of the SOC  
- Double check previous data
- Rule out False Positive

tasks.title: AC5. All Affected Endpoints Contained?
tasks.description: If all affected endpoints have been contained, you can go to the next phase, otherwise continue bellow.

tasks.title: AR3. Validate Countermeasures
tasks.description:
Determine if legitimate elements are blocked by:  
- Proxy
- Firewall
- EDR

If so, go back to [Update Defenses](https://github.com/socfortress/Playbooks/tree/main/IRP-AccountCompromised#update-defenses)
Otherwise go to the next phase **Post Incident**
